OrgName: PC Drivers HeadQuarters, LP d/b/a Driver Support
activities:
Personal Information Received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland:
Driver Support software service is designed to improve PC hardware and peripheral performance by automatically provisioning the latest device driver software necessary as those devices are discovered.  We collect personal information in order to create an account for our service, to obtain customer's authorization for payment for our service (credit card, bank), and to identify customers when they contact us e.g. customer service.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer data entered by the customer on line in order to create an account and/or authorize payment.
recoursemech: We use TRUSTe as a third party mechanism for any dispute resolution.
